lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.en: It's great to see you again.
items.explanation_en: This sentence expresses happiness about meeting someone again.

items.en: I hope you are doing well.
items.explanation_en: This is a friendly inquiry about someone's current state.

items.en: What have you been up to?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about someone's recent activities.

items.en: Take care and see you soon!
items.explanation_en: This phrase is a friendly way to say goodbye.
This question checks if someone is having a good day.

items.en: What time do you usually wake up?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's morning routine.

items.en: Did you have a good vacation?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about someone's recent holiday.

items.en: What are your plans for the weekend?
items.target: ¿Cuáles son tus planes para el fin de semana?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's upcoming weekend activities.

items.en: I look forward to seeing you again.
items.explanation_en: This expresses anticipation for a future meeting.
This question asks about someone's recent well-being.
